data.title: Specview: 1-D spectral visualization and analysis of astronomical spectrograms
data.name: specview
data.description: Archived, see https://github.com/spacetelescope/specviz for future development. Spectrum visualization, manipulation,  and fitting

evidence: "This repo represents the work done for the first sprint aimed at creating a one-dimensional spectral analysis tool." (indicates a scientific analysis application)

"Whether or not this code base will become an astropy affiliate package, the current framework as been placed under the `package-template`_" (shows it is a scientific Python package, but no mention of package registry or binaries)
Owner org is `spacetelescope` and README references JWST Data Analysis Task Force and Forum, implying development under a formal space telescope science institution.
